doc: ['Supervised Machine Learning Approaches to Modeling Residential Infill Development in the City of Los Angeles .', 'While infill development is widely accepted by city as an alternative to urban sprawl , a very dearth of research has attempted to measure infill development and identify contributing factor to infill development .', 'Filling this research gap , this paper model residential infill development in the City of Los Angeles by employing five machine learning ( ML ) algorithms .', 'This paper attempts to identify the best-performing ML algorithms by comparing the performance of the ML algorithms .', 'Of the five ML algorithms tested , the random forest ( RF ) and k-nearest neighbor ( kNN ) algorithms are selected as the best-performing algorithms .', 'The RF algorithm rank independent variable from most to least important .', 'Overall , the rank suggested that residential infill development in the City of Los Angeles is significantly influenced by the physical condition of property and neighborhood rather than socioeconomic characteristic .', 'Diverse land us , good housing mix , and rail transit accessibility also , importantly , contributed to the infill development .', "This finding suggests that the city 's planning effort , such as the promotion of accessory dwelling unit ( ADU ) development and the expansion of rail transit , can create a virtuous circle for sustainable urban development .", 'Automatic identification of address : A systematic literature review .', 'Address matching continues to play a central role at various level , through geocoding and data integration from different source , with a view to promote activity such as urban planning , location-based service , and the construction of database like those used in census operation .', 'However , the task of address matching continues to face several challenge , such as non-standard or incomplete address record or address written in more complex language .', 'In order to better understand how current limitation can be overcome , this paper conducted a systematic literature review focused on automated approach to address matching and their evolution across time .', 'The Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses ( PRISMA ) guideline were followed , resulting in a final set of 41 paper published between 2002 and 2021 , the great majority of which are after 2017 , with Chinese author leading the way .', 'The main finding revealed a consistent move from more traditional approach to deep learning method based on semantics , encoder-decoder architecture , and attention mechanism , as well as the very recent adoption of hybrid approach making an increased use of spatial constraint and entity .', 'The adoption of evolutionary-based approach and privacy preserving method stand as some of the research gaps to address in future study .', 'Identifying urban built environment factor in pregnancy care and maternal mental health outcome .', 'Background : Risk factor related to the built environment have been associated with woman ’ s mental health and preventive care .', 'This study sought to identify built environment factor that are associated with variation in prenatal care and subsequent pregnancy-related outcome in an urban setting .', 'Method : In a retrospective observational study , we characterized the type and frequency of prenatal care event that are associated with the various built environment factor of the patient ’ residing neighborhood .', 'In comparison to woman living in higher-quality built environment , we hypothesize that woman who reside in lower-quality built environment experience different pattern of clinical event that may increase the risk for adverse outcome .', 'Using machine learning , we performed pattern detection to characterize the variability in prenatal care concerning encounter type , clinical problem , and medication prescription .', 'Structural equation modeling was used to test the association among built environment , prenatal care variation , and pregnancy outcome .', 'The main outcome is postpartum depression ( PPD ) diagnosis within 1 year following childbirth .', 'The exposure were the quality of the built environment in the patient ’ residing neighborhood .', 'Electronic health record ( EHR ) data of pregnant woman ( n = 8,949 ) who had live delivery at an urban academic medical center from 2015 to 2017 were included in the study .', 'Result : We discovered prenatal care pattern that were summarized into three common type .', 'Woman who experienced the prenatal care pattern with the highest rate of PPD were more likely to reside in neighborhood with homogeneous land use , lower walkability , lower air pollutant concentration , and lower retail floor ratio after adjusting for age , neighborhood average education level , marital status , and income inequality .', 'Conclusion : In an urban setting , multi-purpose and walkable community were found to be associated with a lower risk of PPD .', 'Finding may inform urban design policy and provide awareness for care provider on the association of patient ’ residing neighborhood and healthy pregnancy .', 'An end-to-end point of interest ( Poi ) conflation framework .', 'Point of interest ( POI ) data serf as a valuable source of semantic information for place of interest and has many geospatial application in real estate , transportation , and urban planning .', 'With the availability of different data source , POI conflation serves as a valuable technique for enriching data quality and coverage by merging the POI data from multiple source .', 'This study proposes a novel end-to-end POI conflation framework consisting of six step , starting with data procurement , schema standardisation , taxonomy mapping , POI matching , POI unification , and data verification .', 'The feasibility of the proposed framework was demonstrated in a case study conducted in the eastern region of Singapore , where the POI data from five data source was conflated to form a unified POI dataset .', 'Based on the evaluation conducted , the resulting unified dataset was found to be more comprehensive and complete than any of the five POI data source alone .', 'Furthermore , the proposed approach for identifying POI match between different data source outperformed all baseline approaches with a matching accuracy of 97.6 % with an average run time below 3 min when matching over 12,000 POIs to result in 8699 unique POIs , thereby demonstrating the framework ’ s scalability for large scale implementation in dense urban contexts .', 'Urban morphological feature extraction and multi-dimensional similarity analysis based on deep learning approach .', 'The study of urban morphology contributes to the evolution of city and sustainable development .', 'Urban morphological feature extraction and similarity analysis represents a practical framework in many study to interpret and introduce the current built environment to aid in proposing novel design .', 'In conventional method , morphological feature are represented based on qualitative description , symbolical interpretation , or manually selected indicator .', 'However , these method could cause subjective bias and limit the generalizability .', 'This study proposes a hybrid data-driven approach to support quantitative morphological description and multi-dimensional similarity analysis for urban design decision-making and to further morphology-related study using information abundance via a deep-learning approach .', 'We constructed a dataset of 3817 residential plot with geometrical and related infrastructure information .', 'A deep convolutional neural network , GoogLeNet , was implemented with the plot ’ figure–ground image , by quantifying the morphological feature into 2048-dimensional feature vector .', 'We conducted a similarity analysis of the plot by calculating the Euclidean distance between the high-dimensional feature vector .', 'Then , a comparison study was performed by retrieving case based on the plot shape and plot with building separately .', 'The proposed method considers the overall characteristic of the urban morphology and social infrastructure situation for similarity analysis .', 'This method is flexible and effective .', 'The proposed framework indicates the feasibility and potential of integrating task-oriented information to introduce custom and adequate reference via deep learning method , which could support decision making and association study on morphology with urban consequence .', 'This work could serve as a basis for further typo-morphology study and other morphology-related ecological , social , and economic study for sustainable built environment .', 'Identifying urban poverty using high-resolution satellite imagery and machine learning approach : Implication for housing inequality .', 'Enriching Asian perspective on the rapid identification of urban poverty and its implication for housing inequality , this paper contributes empirical evidence about the utility of image feature derived from high-resolution satellite imagery and machine learning approach for identifying urban poverty in China at the community level .', 'For the case of the Jiangxia District and Huangpi District of Wuhan , image feature , including perimeter , line segment detector ( LSD ) , Hough transform , gray-level cooccurrence matrix ( GLCM ) , histogram of oriented gradient ( HoG ) , and local binary pattern ( LBP ) , are calculated , and four machine learning approach and 25 variable are applied to identify urban poverty and relatively important variable .', 'The result show that image feature and machine learning approach can be used to identify urban poverty with the best model performance with a coefficient of determination , R2 , of 0.5341 and 0.5324 for Jiangxia and Huangpi , respectively , although some difference exist among the approach and study area .', 'The importance of each variable differs for each approach and study area ; however , the relatively important variable are similar .', 'In particular , four variable achieved relatively satisfactory prediction result for all model and presented obvious difference in varying community with different poverty level .', 'Housing inequality within low-income neighborhood , which is a response to gap in wealth , income , and housing affordability among social group , is an important manifestation of urban poverty .', 'Policy maker can implement these finding to rapidly identify urban poverty , and the finding have potential application for addressing housing inequality and proving the rationality of urban planning for building a sustainable society .', 'Geosilhouettes : Geographical measure of cluster fit .', 'Regionalization , under various guise and description , is a longstanding and pervasive interest of urban study .', 'With an increasingly large number of study on urban place detection in language , behavior , pricing , and demography , recent critique of longstanding regional science perspective on place detection have focused on the arbitrariness and non-geographical nature of measure of best fit .', 'In this paper , we develop new explicitly geographical measure of cluster fit .', 'These hybrid spatial–social measure , called geosilhouettes , are demonstrated to capture the “ core ” of geographical cluster in racial data on census block in Brooklyn neighborhood .', 'These new geosilhouettes are also useful in a variety of boundary analysis and outlier detection problem .', 'In this paper , the thinking behind geosilhouettes is presented , their mathematical form is defined , they are demonstrated , and new direction of research are discussed .', 'Research on Urban Renewal Public Space Design Based on Convolutional Neural Network Model .', 'By establishing a database of urban space case , machine learning algorithms and deep learning algorithm can be used to train computer to learn how to design urban space .', 'Based on the basic concept of machine learning and deep learning and their procedural logic , this paper explores the generation mode of traffic road network , neighborhood space form , and building function layout of urban space and uses the northern extension of the central green axis of the city as an application case to confirm its feasibility in order to seek a set of artificial intelligence-based urban space generation design method and provide a new idea for the innovative development of urban design method .', 'Reviewing the application of machine learning method to model urban form indicator in planning decision support system : Potential , issue and challenge .', 'Modern city dynamically face several challenge including digitalization , sustainability , resilience and economic development .', 'Urban planner and designer must develop urban form that address these challenge .', 'With the integration of new communication and information technology ( Smartphone , GIS , Drones , IoT , Sensors , etc . )', ', urban activity have generated large volume of urban data .', 'The rapid growth in term of collection and big data storage capacity combined with the ever-increasing computational power of modern machine have made possible their efficient treatment using machine ( ML ) and deep learning ( DL ) algorithms .', 'The emergence of such groundbreaking method has in turn helped to address the challenge of modern-day city in several domain ( health , security , mobility , etc ) .', "ML algorithm have been proposed to model the urban form 's indicator for intelligent urban planning decision making .", 'They have been proven to perform better than the traditional method .', 'However , the potential of ML has not yet been fully explored in research for urban planning decision support .', 'This paper presents a comprehensive review of ML application for mitigating the challenge of modern city planning .', 'First and foremost , an overview of the urban form , source of urban data , the ML and DL technique as well as their potential in solving the aforementioned challenge .', 'For each ML method , we will highlight it working principle , advantage , disadvantage and potential application using comparative table .', "Finally , we will discuss the issue and challenge of ML method in urban form 's modeling while ultimately advocating some future research direction .", 'Transfer learning-based city similarity measurement : A case study on urban hotel .', 'With the development of modern city , multiple type and wide distribution of urban data has been gradually collected .', 'Effectively using urban data to solve city development and planning issue has become a research hot-spot .', 'Currently , the data scale in modern city is quite different , and the fitting degree of machine learning algorithm based on single city is not mature yet .', 'This paper study the problem with transfer learning technique , and trains the prediction model of urban hotel development scale using multi-source city data .', 'Based on the location data and related information of 15 different city , the relevant knowledge is transferred , and a city feature extraction and similarity measurement framework is proposed .', 'Machine Learning Predictors for Sustainable Urban Planning .', 'While essential for economic reason , rapid urbanization has had many negative impact on the environment and the social wellbeing of humanity .', 'Heavy traffic , unexpected geohazards are some of the effect of uncontrollable development .', 'This situation points its fingerto urban planning and design ; there are numerous automation tool to help urban planner assess and forecast , yet unplanned development still occurs , impeding sustainability .', 'Automation tool use machine learning classification model to analyze spatial data and various trend view before planning a new urban development .', 'Although there are many sophisticated tool and massive datasets , big city with colossal migration still witness traffic jam , pollution , and environmental degradation affecting urban dweller ’ quality .', 'This study will analyze the current predictor in urban planning machine learning model and identify the suitable predictor to support sustainable urban planning .', 'A correct set of predictor could improve the efficiency of the urban development classification model and help urban planner to enhance the quality of life in big city .', 'Virtual design of urban planning based on GIS big data and machine learning .', 'In order to build a virtual urban planning model and improve the effect of urban planning , this paper builds a virtual urban planning design model based on GIS big data technology and machine learning algorithms , and proposes a solution that combines multiple feature .', 'With the development of polarized SAR in the direction of high resolution , a single feature often can not fully express the detailed information of ground object , resulting in poor classification result and low accuracy .', 'The combination of multiple feature can express feature information well .', 'In addition , this paper uses the ELM method to plan SAR ground object classification , uses an extreme learning machine classification algorithm with fast learning speed and good classification effect , and uses ELM as a classifier .', 'Finally , this paper designs experiment to explore the performance of the model constructed in this paper from two aspect : detection accuracy and planning score .', 'The research result show that the model constructed in this paper meets the expected goal .', 'Delineating urban job-housing pattern at a parcel scale with street view imagery .', 'Empirical data are limited to decipher where people live and work in large city ; however , neighborhood information , such as street view image , is rich and abundant .', 'We construct a ResNet-50-based social detection model to explore the potential relationship between street view image and job-housing attribute .', 'The method extracts street view image of a neighborhood in all eight direction to predict land parcel ’ job-housing attribute and uses an entropy index to measure the degree of job-housing mixture in Shenzhen as an example .', 'The social-detection model performs well with a low RMSE ( 0.1094 ) in identifying job-housing pattern .', 'The eight-direction neighborhood method shows the best support for sufficient neighborhood information from street view image ( RMSE = 0.1135 ) compared with other neighborhood method .', 'This study demonstrates the feasibility of using street-view image and deep learning to characterize job-housing attribute consistent with finding from urban study with socioeconomic data ; for example , the research finding concurs that Shenzhen has many high job-housing mixture with very few area designated for job or residence .', 'The proposed method , when applied regularly , can help monitor spatial dynamic of urban job-housing pattern to inform city planning and development .', 'Remote measurement of building usable floor area – Algorithms fusion .', 'Rapid change that are taking place in the urban environment have significant impact on urban growth .', 'Most city and urban region all over the world compete to increase resident and visitor satisfaction .', 'The growing requirement and rapidity of introducing new technology to all aspect of resident ’ lives force city and urban region to implement “ smart city ” concept in their activity .', 'Real estate is one of the principal anthropogenic component of urban environment thus become a subject of thorough multidisciplinary analysis in the field of data requiring spatial information system .', 'Recent advance in information technology , combined with the increased availability of high-resolution imagery from Earth observation , create an opportunity to use new source of data that enable to identify , monitor , and solved many of urban environmental problem .', 'The aim of the paper is to elaborate precise , complete and detailed property information with the use of remote sensing observation in a suitable numerical algorithm .', 'The author concentrate on providing one of the most important , and probably the most lacking , feature describing property – building usable floor area ( BUFA ) .', 'The solution is elaborated in the form of an automatic algorithm based on machine learning and computer vision technology related to LiDAR ( big data ) , close range image with respect to spatial information system requirement .', 'The obtained result related to BUFA estimation in comparison to the state-of-the-art result are satisfactory and may increase the reliability of decision-making in investment , fiscal , registration and planning aspect .', 'Using GIS and machine learning to classify residential status of urban building in low and middle income setting .', 'Utilising satellite image for planning and development is becoming a common practice as computational power and machine learning capability expand .', 'In this paper , we explore the use of satellite image derived building footprint data to classify the residential status of urban building in low and middle income country .', 'A recently developed ensemble machine learning building classification model is applied for the first time to the Democratic Republic of the Congo , and to Nigeria .', 'The model is informed by building footprint and label data of greater completeness and attribute consistency than have previously been available for these country .', 'A GIS workflow is described that semiautomates the preparation of data for input to the model .', 'The workflow is designed to be particularly useful to those who apply the model to additional country and use input data from diverse source .', 'Result show that the ensemble model correctly classifies between 85 % and 93 % of structure as residential and nonresidential across both country .', 'The classification output are likely to be valuable in the modelling of human population distribution , as well as in a range of related application such as urban planning , resource allocation , and service delivery .', 'The shape of segregation : The role of urban form in immigrant assimilation .', 'The built environment can mediate or constrain the opportunity for social interaction , essential to the formation of social tie .', 'This study uses the large inflow of immigrant in Barcelona between 1998 and 2008 to study whether the configuration of building and open urban area in a block is associated with the residential segregation of immigrants—a proxy for social interaction .', 'Based on a rich set of shape metric , I use machine learning technique to classify each block in Barcelona into one of eight typology , which provide a summary measure of their built environment .', 'I then combine these data with measure of residential segregation constructed at the building level using data on the exact address of each resident of Barcelona .', 'The finding show that some feature of the built environment of a block—as measured by the typologies—are systematically associated with reduced residential segregation of Spaniards and newly arrived immigrant in that block .', 'A deep learning approach to urban street functionality prediction based on centrality measure and stacked denoising autoencoder .', 'In urban planning and transportation management , the centrality characteristic of urban street are vital measure to consider .', 'Centrality can help in understanding the structural property of dense traffic network that affect both human life and activity in city .', 'Many city classify urban street to provide stakeholder with a group of street guideline for possible new rehabilitation such as sidewalk , curb , and setback .', 'Transportation research always considers street network as a connection between different urban area .', 'The street functionality classification defines the role of each element of the urban street network ( USN ) .', "Some potential factor such as land use mix , accessible service , design goal , and administrator ' policy can affect the movement pattern of urban traveler .", 'In this study , nine centrality measure are used to classify the urban road in four city evaluating the structural importance of street segment .', "In our work , a Stacked Denoising Autoencoder ( SDAE ) predicts a street 's functionality , then logistic regression is used as a classifier .", 'Our proposed classifier can differentiate between four different class adopted from the U.S. Department of Transportation ( USDT ) : principal arterial road , minor arterial road , collector road , and local road .', 'The SDAE-based model showed that regular grid configuration with repeated pattern are more influential in forming the functionality of road network compared to those with less regularity in their spatial structure .', 'This article is an open access article distributed under the term and condition of the Creative Commons Attribution ( CC BY ) license ( http : //creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ ) .', 'Data-driven historical preservation : a case study in Shanghai .', 'Historical preservation is becoming ever important in globalizing Shanghai city .', 'However , traditional survey-based way of policy making are not efficient .', 'This work introduces the data-driven technique with machine learning algorithm to find the relationship between the feature of the historical site and the popularity , which relates to the economy such as tourism and the associated GDP contribution .', 'The method is automatic , which relieves the work load from statistical survey and other inefficient traditional approach .', 'Moreover , while the survey can only reflect the current condition , the machine learning approach has the ability of predicting the possible outcome based on existing data , which is helpful when decision on protection and development are to be made .', 'We collect data from selected historical site in Shanghai to illustrate the procedure of the proposed data-driven approach .', 'The case study demonstrates the capability of prediction and shows its promising future in guiding policy making , resource allocation and scientific research .', 'A deep learning architecture for semantic address matching .', 'Address matching is a crucial step in geocoding , which plays an important role in urban planning and management .', 'To date , the unprecedented development of location-based service has generated a large amount of unstructured address data .', 'Traditional address matching method mainly focus on the literal similarity of address record and are therefore not applicable to the unstructured address data .', 'In this study , we introduce an address matching method based on deep learning to identify the semantic similarity between address record .', 'First , we train the word2vec model to transform the address record into their corresponding vector representation .', 'Next , we apply the enhanced sequential inference model ( ESIM ) , a deep text-matching model , to make local and global inference to determine if two address match .', 'To evaluate the accuracy of the proposed method , we fine-tune the model with real-world address data from the Shenzhen Address Database and compare the output with those of several popular address matching method .', 'The result indicate that the proposed method achieves a higher matching accuracy for unstructured address record , with its precision , recall , and F1 score ( i.e.', ', the harmonic mean of precision and recall ) reaching 0.97 on the test set .', 'Clustering and morphological analysis of campus context .', "Figure-ground '' is an indispensable and significant part of urban design and urban morphological research , especially for the study of the university , which exists as a unique product of the city development and also develops with the city .", 'In the past few decade , method adapted by scholar of analyzing the figure-ground relationship of university campus have gradually turned from qualitative to quantitative .', 'And with the widespread application of AI technology in various discipline , emerging research tool such as machine learning/deep learning have also been used in the study of urban morphology .', 'On this basis , this paper reports on a potential application of deep clustering and big-data method for campus morphological analysis .', 'It document a new framework for compressing the customized diagrammatic image containing a campus and its surrounding city context into integrated feature vector via a convolutional autoencoder model , and using the compressed feature vector for clustering and quantitative analysis of campus morphology .', 'Construction of landscape architecture art design based on streaming medium data processing .', 'In urban planning , the design of garden landscape is not a difficult thing , it needs to adopt effective design method .', 'Different way of landscape design can add natural landscape to the urban ecosystem , and will not destroy the ecological environment , but will gradually improve the quality of the ecological environment .', 'However , the design method of landscape in urban planning in China are not perfect enough , there are many problem , and it is difficult to improve the ecological environment of the city .', 'Therefore , in the process of urban planning , the relevant personnel should fully understand the design method of landscape , and constantly innovate to create a quality living environment for people .', 'In this paper , we propose the landscape architecture system based on mobile edge streaming medium data processing .', 'In the system , video surveillance system is mainly used to collect data , and the edge computing is the further processing of the inner connection .', 'Especially , the stram data is analysed based on the machine learning model and the connection with the design is analysed .', 'The experimental result prove robustness of the methodology .', 'Predicting the environment of a neighborhood : A use case for France .', 'Notion of neighbourhood is critical in many application such as social study , cultural heritage management , urban planning or environment impact on health .', 'Two main challenge deal with the definition and representation of this spatial concept and with the gathering of descriptive data on a large area ( country ) .', 'In this paper , we present a use case in the context of real estate search for representing French neighbourhood in a uniform manner , using a few environment variable ( e.g.', ', building type , social class ) .', 'Since it is not possible to manually classify all neighbourhood , our objective is to automatically predict this new information .', 'Uncertainty of human perception in visual image interpretation in complex urban environment .', 'Today satellite image are mostly exploited automatically due to advance in image classification method .', 'Manual visual image interpretation ( MVII ) , however , still plays a significant role e.g.', ', to generate training data for machine-learning algorithms or for validation purpose .', 'In certain urban environment , however , of e.g.', ', highest density and structural complexity , textural and spectral complication in overlapping roof-structures still demand the human interpreter if one aims to capture individual building structure .', 'The cognitive perception and real-world experience are still inevitable .', 'Against these background , this article aims at quantifying and interpreting the uncertainty of mapping rooftop footprint of such area .', 'We focus on the agreement among interpreter and which aspect of perception and element of image interpretation affect mapping .', 'Ten test person digitized six complex built-up area .', 'Hereby , we receive quantitative information about spatial variable of building to systematically check the consistency and congruence of result .', 'An additional questionnaire reveals qualitative information about obstacle .', "Generally , we find large difference among interpreter ' mapping result and a high consistency of result for the same interpreter .", 'We measure rising deviation correlate with a rising morphologic complexity .', 'High degree of individuality are expressed e.g.', ', in time consumption , in-situ- or geographic information system ( GIS ) -precognition whereas data source mostly influences the mapping procedure .', 'By this study , we aim to fill a gap as prior research using MVII often does not implement an uncertainty analysis or quantify mapping aberration .', 'We conclude that remote sensing study should not only rely unquestioned on MVII for validation ; furthermore , data and method are needed to suspend uncertainty .', 'Deprivation pocket through the lens of convolutional neural network .', 'Machine learning technique have been frequently applied to map urban deprivation ( commonly referred to as slum ) in very high-resolution satellite image .', 'Among these , Deep Convolutional Neural Networks have shown exceptional efficiency in automated deprivation mapping at the local scale .', 'Yet these network have never been used to map very small heterogeneous deprivation area ( pocket ) at large scale .', 'This study proposes and evaluates a U-Net-Compound model to map deprivation pocket in Bangalore , India .', 'The model only relies on RGB satellite image with a resolution of 2 m as these are more commonly accessible to local urban planning department .', 'The experiment assumes a practical situation where only limited reference data is available for the model to learn the spatial morphology of deprivation pocket .', 'It tests whether an updated map of deprivation pocket can be obtained with limited information .', 'The model performance to map a large number of deprivation pocket is examined by incrementally changing the model architecture and the amount of training data .', 'Result show that the proposed model is sensitive to the amount of spatial information contained in the training data .', 'Once sufficient spatial information is learnt through a few sample , the city scale mapping accuracy outperforms existing model in mapping small deprivation pocket , achieving a Jaccard Index of 54 % .', 'This study demonstrated that a well-designed convolutional neural network can map the existence , extent , as well as distribution pattern of deprivation pocket at the city scale with limited training data , which is essential for upscaling research output to provide important information for the formulation of pro-poor policy .', 'Using Random Forest on Real-World City Data for Urban Planning in a Visual Semantic Decision Support System .', 'The constantly increasing amount and availability of urban data derived from varying source leads to an assortment of challenge that include , among others , the consolidation , visualization , and maximal exploitation prospect of the aforementioned data .', 'A preeminent problem affecting urban planning is the appropriate choice of location to host a particular activity ( either commercial or common welfare service ) or the correct use of an existing building or empty space .', 'In this paper , we propose an approach to address these challenge availed with machine learning technique .', 'The proposed system combine , fuse , and merges various type of data from different source , encodes them using a novel semantic model that can capture and utilize both low-level geometric information and higher level semantic information and subsequently feeds them to the random forests classifier , as well as other supervised machine learning model for comparison .', 'Our experimental evaluation on multiple real-world data set comparing the performance of several classifier ( including Feedforward Neural Networks , Support Vector Machines , Bag of Decision Trees , k-Nearest Neighbor and Naïve Bayes ) , indicated the superiority of Random Forests in term of the examined performance metric ( Accuracy , Specificity , Precision , Recall , F-measure and G-mean ) .', 'Detecting advertising on building façades with computer vision .', 'Outdoor advertising influences the visual environment of any modern city .', 'Advertising and information sign on building façades are one of the type of outdoor advertising .', 'As a rule , there are law and design code in city that define permissible look of such sign .', 'At the same time , in metropolis , there is a problem of timely detection of advertising construction on façades that violate these rule .', "City-scale monitoring of façade condition is beyond the capability of any city 's authority .", 'To address this issue , we propose a solution which combines street-view map and machine learning to automate the process of searching for law-breaking advertising object on building façades .', 'We develop a dataset for a machine learning model and a set of check for detected advertising object to check their legality .', 'The resulting approach can provide data for future research and help maintain coherent urban visual environment .', 'Multi-criteria Evaluation vs Perceived Urban Quality : An Exploratory Comparison .', 'This study compares a service-based and environmental evaluation of an urban area with that of its perceived walkability .', 'The Pampulha region in Belo Horizonte , Brazil was first put through a multi-criteria spatial evaluation with respect to a set of spatial data considered relevant for liveability and quality of life in city , and was subsequently assessed in term of perceived walkability ( using a machine learning procedure of a training set provided by local auditor ) .', 'The two type of analysis were compared and qualitatively aggregated to obtain a joint spatial score of the urban environment .', 'The finding provide useful insight for planning and urban policy .', 'Development of generating system for architectural color icon using google map platform and tensorflow-segmentation .', 'In this research , the goal is to develop a generating system for architectural color icon using Google Map Platform and Tensorflow-Segmentation .', 'There has been no case of developing a system that allows user to visualize the color tendency of building as architectural color icon for each building element from image of various region .', 'It is considered meaningful to be able to create criterion for decision making in architecture and the urban design by developing a system to clarify the current state of the architectural color .', 'It will contribute a rise in the consciousness of landscape conservation and be essential for the design of architecture and public object .', 'This paper includes the explanation of development method , use experiment , and consideration of five problem among architectural color icon creation .', 'It is assumed that the accuracy of the present system will be better as the technology improves .', 'Mapping long-term dynamic of population and dwelling based on a multi-temporal analysis of urban morphology .', 'Information on the distribution and dynamic of dwelling and their inhabitant is essential to support decision-making in various field such as energy provision , land use planning , risk assessment and disaster management .', 'However , as various different of approach to estimate the current distribution of population and dwelling exists , further evidence on past dynamic is needed for a better understanding of urban process .', 'This article therefore addresses the question of whether and how accurately historical distribution of dwelling and inhabitant can be reconstructed with commonly available geodata from national mapping and cadastral agency .', 'For this purpose , an approach for the automatic derivation of such information is presented .', 'The data basis is constituted by a current digital landscape model and a 3D building model combined with historical land use information automatically extracted from historical topographic map .', 'For this purpose , method of image processing , machine learning , change detection and dasymetric mapping are applied .', 'The result for a study area in Germany show that it is possible to automatically derive decadal historical pattern of population and dwelling from 1950 to 2011 at the level of a 100 m grid with slight underestimation and acceptable standard deviation .', 'By a differentiated analysis we were able to quantify the error for different urban structure type .', "The syntactic signature of starbucks ' location Towards a machine-learning approach to location decision-making .", 'The space syntax Theory of Natural Movement postulates that everything else being equal , land use selects their location based on the asymmetry of accessibility created by the configuration of the street network .', 'In this article , I test the hypothesis whether configurational ( syntactic ) property of an urban street network are relevant for the location of land use .', "If syntactic feature are relevant , then land use type may have a 'syntactic signature ' .", 'To identify this blueprint , I apply machine-learning technique to datasets of syntactic measure , for ten business type .', 'The result are ten model , each with the syntactic blueprint of a type of business .', 'The model are used to predict the existence , or not , of such business in segment of the map of London .', "The performance of the model varies , with fifty per cent reaching statistical significance , including one with 'good ' prediction ability .", "The model for Starbucks coffee shop and solicitor 's office have the strongest prediction ability .", 'The exploratory exercise demonstrates the potential of the machine-learning method Random Forests , when supervised and individually applied to a business activity , to identify the syntactic signature of business type .', 'Such model can be used during planning and design and on location study .', 'The result strengthen the candidacy of syntactic measurement to location-decision-making .', 'Moreover , they reinforce the theory of Natural Movement .', 'Feature selection and knowledge extraction from buppu 2000 and 2010 census using artificial intelligence .', 'The census of population and dwelling undertaken by national state institution world over at regular time interval , is a fantastic source of information .', 'However , there are major challenge to overcome when transforming the census data that usually consists of a vast number of attribute , into useful knowledge .', 'In this paper , an artificial intelligent approach is investigated to select appropriate attribute feature that indicate interesting pattern in Beppu census ward in 2000 and 2010 .', 'The result of the SOM ( unsupervised artificial neural network ) based clustering , GIS visualisation and machine learning ( J48 and JRip function of WEKA ) , provide relevant discerning feature , new pattern and new knowledge that can be of use in many application domain , such as urban planning , resource management and transport planning .', 'Classification of urban scene from georeferenced image in urban street-view context .', 'This paper addresses the challenging problem of scene classification in street-view georeferenced image of urban environment .', 'More precisely , the goal of this task is semantic image classification , consisting in predicting in a given image , the presence or absence of a pre-defined class ( e.g .', 'shop , vegetation , etc . )', '.', 'The approach is based on the BOSSA representation , which enriches the Bag of Words ( BoW ) model , in conjunction with the Spatial Pyramid Matching scheme and kernel-based machine learning technique .', 'The proposed method handles problem that arise in large scale urban environment due to acquisition condition ( static and dynamic objects/pedestrians ) combined with the continuous acquisition of data along the vehicle direction , the varying light condition and strong occlusion ( due to the presence of tree , traffic sign , car , etc . )', 'giving rise to high intra-class variability .', 'Experiment were conducted on a large dataset of high resolution image collected from two main avenue from the 12th district in Paris and the approach shows promising result .', 'Urban Data Mining using emergent SOM .', 'The term of Urban Data-Mining is defined to describe a methodological approach that discovers logical or mathematical and partly complex description of urban pattern and regularity inside the data .', 'The concept of data mining in connection with knowledge discovery technique plays an important role for the empirical examination of high dimensional data in the field of urban research .', 'The procedure on the basis of knowledge discovery system are currently not exactly scrutinised for a meaningful integration into the regional and urban planning and development process .', 'In this study ESOM is used to examine community in Germany .', 'The data deal with the question of dynamic process ( e.g .', 'shrinking and growing of city ) .', 'In the future it might be possible to establish an instrument that defines objective criterion for the benchmark process about urban phenomenon .', 'The use of GIS supplements the process of knowledge conversion and communication .']

['Application of random forest and shap tree explainer in exploring spatial ( In ) justice to aid urban planning .', 'In light of recent local , national , and global event , spatial justice provides a potentially powerful lens by which to explore a multitude of spatial inequality .', 'For more than two decade , scholar have been espousing the power of this concept to help develop more equitable and just community .', 'However , defining spatial justice and developing a methodology for quantitatively an-alyzing it is complicated and no agreed upon metric for examining spatial justice has been developed .', 'Instead , individual measure of spatial injustice have been studied .', 'One such individual measure is economic mobility .', 'Recent research on economic mobility has revealed the importance of local geography on upward mobility and may serve as an important keystone in developing a metric for multiple place-based issue of spatial inequality .', 'This paper seeks to explore place-based variable within individual census tract in an effort to understand their impact on economic mobility and potentially spatial justice .', 'The methodology relies on machine learning technique and the result show that the best performing model is able to predict economic mobility of a census tract based on its spatial variable with 86 % accuracy .', 'The availability and density of job , compactness of the area , and the presence of medical facility and underground storage tank have the greatest influence , whereas some of the influential feature are positively while the others are negatively associated .', 'In the end , this research will allow for comparative analysis between differing geography and also identify leading variable in the overall quest for spatial justice .', 'Sustainable development scale of housing estate : An economic assessment using machine learning approach .', 'Economic sustainability is often addressed from the perspective of economic growth and at the national level .', 'In contrast , this research attempts to examine the question of economic sustainability of human settlement at a local project level .', 'Urban planner need to strike a balance between dispersal and over-concentration of population in city .', 'The existing theory suggest that either excessively low or extremely high level of household concentration is undesirable to a neighborhood .', 'In this study , an economic assessment using machine learning ( ML ) technique is used to identify the threshold scale of a housing estate , which comprises many privately owned residential unit ( like condos ) with shared amenity .', 'Using two decade of property transaction data in Hong Kong as our evidence , this study has found that a tipping point exists in the development scale of these housing estate .', 'Housing value initially rise with the number of residential unit in a housing estate but gradually fall when it increases beyond a critical limit .', 'This nonlinear economic relationship is attributed to the per household share of common facility , which does not increase sufficiently to match with the growing population density of the housing estate .', 'The policy implication is that , to optimize housing supply , urban planning should not just focus on increasing the development bulk of housing but should also pay attention to the possible bottleneck in the provision of shared amenity in the neighborhood .', 'Safe city in the new urban world : A comparative cluster dynamic analysis through machine learning .', 'City in the ‘ New Urban World ’ display an enormous diversity in appearance , growth and performance .', 'The awareness is growing that the urban development potential ( ‘ magnetism ’ ) of city is closely related to safety and security condition in these city .', 'This paper develops a new analytical framework based on a wealth of empirical data on both safety/security and socio-economic magnetism achievement of many world city , by combining two comprehensive relevant global urban data base .', 'The aim of the study is to offer a comparative analysis of the combined safety/security data and socio-economic performance data of 30 global city , through the use of an advanced sequential cluster dynamic analysis that is ( partly ) inspired by a novel machine learning approach ( using Python software ) .', 'In this way , city can be categorized according to their quantitative characteristic feature represented by the relevant cluster .', 'It appears that city safety/security feature are an important predictor of the variability in overall urban performance regarding magnetism .', 'This study allows also for drawing relevant policy lesson .', 'Delineation of an Urban Community Life Circle Based on a Machine-Learning Estimation of Spatiotemporal Behavioral Demand .', 'Delineating life circle is an essential prerequisite for urban community life circle planning .', 'Recent study combined the environmental contexts with resident ’ global positioning system ( GPS ) data to delineate the life circle .', 'This method , however , is constrained by GPS data , and it can only be applied in the GPS surveyed community .', 'To address this limitation , this study developed a generalizable delineation method without the constraint of behavioral data .', 'According to previous research , the community life circle consists of the walking-accessible range and internal structure .', 'The core task to develop the generalizable method was to estimate the spatiotemporal behavioral demand for each plot of land to acquire the internal structure of the life circle , as the range can be delineated primarily based on environmental data .', 'Therefore , behavioral demand estimation model were established through logistic regression and machine learning technique , including decision tree and ensemble learning .', 'The model with the lowest error rate was chosen as the final estimation model for each type of land .', 'Finally , we used a community without GPS data as an example to demonstrate the effectiveness of the estimation model and delineation method .', 'This article extends the existing literature by introducing spatiotemporal behavioral demand estimation model , which learn the relationship between environmental contexts , population composition and the existing delineated result based on GPS data to delineate the internal structure of the community life circle without employing behavioral data .', 'Furthermore , the proposed method and delineation result also contributes to facility adjustment and location selection in life circle planning , people-oriented transformation in urban planning , and activity space estimation of the population in evaluating and improving the urban policy .', 'A glimpse into the future of exposure and vulnerability in city ?', 'Modelling of residential location choice of urban population with random forest .', 'The most common approach to assessing natural hazard risk is investigating the willingness to pay in the presence or absence of such risk .', 'In this work , we propose a new , machine-learning-based , indirect approach to the problem , i.e .', 'through residential-choice modelling .', 'Especially in urban environment , exposure and vulnerability are highly dynamic risk component , both being shaped by a complex and continuous reorganization and redistribution of asset within the urban space , including the ( re- ) location of urban dweller .', 'By modelling residential-choice behaviour in the city of Leipzig , Germany , we seek to examine how exposure and vulnerability are shaped by the residential-location-choice process .', 'The proposed approach reveals hot spot and cold spot of residential choice for distinct socioeconomic group exhibiting heterogeneous preference .', 'We discuss the relationship between observed pattern and disaster risk through the lens of exposure and vulnerability , as well as link to urban planning , and explore how the proposed methodology may contribute to predicting future trend in exposure , vulnerability , and risk through this analytical focus .', 'Avenue for future research include the operational strengthening of these linkage for more effective disaster risk management .', 'An urban data framework for assessing equity in city : Comparing accessibility to healthcare facility in Cascadia .', 'As city continue to grow worldwide , policymakers and urban planner face the dual task of meeting rising demand for essential service while ensuring that benefit accrue to their citizen equitably .', 'We propose a framework for assessing inclusivity and equity in city , which leverages open data and machine learning technique to inform urban infrastructure investment strategy .', 'The framework is applied at a regional scale to compare differential access to healthcare facility ( public hospital and clinic ) via public transit in Vancouver , Seattle and Portland .', 'We find important distributional impact on vulnerable population across the three city .', "Portland displays the highest inequity in hospital and clinic access , and Vancouver the least , owing to Vancouver 's relatively compact geographic area and high population density .", 'For senior , over 75 % are socially excluded from hospital and over 50 % from clinic in Portland , compared to 30 % and 3 % respectively in Vancouver .', 'In all three city , significantly more resident of low-income neighborhood are excluded from healthcare compared to their counterpart in high-income neighborhood .', 'This translates into proportionally higher transportation cost for low-income area resident compared with high-income area resident , regardless of whether they are socially excluded or not .', 'Transportation cost are notably high for low-income senior in Seattle and Vancouver .', 'These finding pose a challenge for inclusive planning , since low-income and senior population may require specialized service and are more reliant on public transportation than the average population .', "Our evaluation framework provides a systematic approach for municipality to account for the distributional effect of transportation and service infrastructure planning , to integrate equity into their decision-making , and to learn from the success and pitfall of each other 's urban policy .", 'Impact of community deprivation on urban park access over time : Understanding the relative role of contributor for urban planning .', 'As an important element of urban landscape , park plays an important role in building environmentally sustainable city .', 'Thus , it is important to examine park accessibility and how it changes over time in relation to community deprivation so as to provide all resident with equitable service .', 'Using the Gaussian-based 2SFCA ( two-step floating catchment area ) method , this paper analyzes dynamic park accessibility from 2016 to 2018 for community within the Hangzhou metropolitan area in China and then quantifies the relative role of local contributor to park accessibility change ( population , park and transport network ) .', 'A machine learning algorithm , which handles the interdependence of deprivation dimension , is further employed to determine the relationship between community deprivation and park accessibility change .', 'Result show that park accessibility continued to grow during the study period , and most community achieved excellent park accessibility by 2018 .', 'Population decrease and park increase contribute positively to improved park accessibility , while transport network change have had less of an impact .', 'Deprived community have observed a rising trend of park accessibility , while the elderly concentrated community are more likely to experience declined park accessibility .', 'Our study provides a new methodological framework , which integrates the geographical accessibility model , economic chain substitution model and machine learning algorithm , for understanding the dynamic park access and associated social inequality in rapidly urbanizing region .', 'The lesson learned from this study should be insightful for urban planning .', 'Investigating Customer Satisfaction Patterns in a Community Livability Context : An Efficiency-Oriented Decision-Making Approach .', 'A comprehensive understanding of neighborhood facility distribution and function along with residential quality of life satisfaction is a key asset for relating livability management to transportation network .', "Due to the simultaneous involvement of varied factor with an individual 's perception of livability , this concept is difficult to measure .", 'Therefore , a more objective mean of quantifying livability is needed .', "The service industry has demonstrated the intersection of machine learning classifier and survey domain knowledge for evaluating user ' quality of experience ; however , this process of inquiry-based learning has never been considered for solving the communication difficulty between community stakeholder and transportation agency .", 'Another area of overlap is that of urban computing , which integrates computing technology in the traditional context of urban area , connecting ubiquitous sensing technology , computational power , and data about the urban environment to promote quality of life for people living in a particular community .', 'To this aim , the focus of this study is on interpreting a linkage between society stated preference and quantitative measure of livability by extracting information from survey-based method and translating it to a quantitative framework using combined service industry and urban computing methodology .', 'This work focuses on four transportation planning-related research question in this blended framework : understanding existing livability pattern , predicting heterogeneous perception of quality of life , prioritizing public preference , and developing a multidimensional livability index ( MLI ) .', 'Localization Decisions of Entrepreneurs : The Role of Path Dependency and Market Forces .', 'The purpose of this research is to determine the role of path dependency and market force in the localization decision of entrepreneur from different industry .', 'We hypothesize that most industry develop new entity based on the number of company from the same industry that already exist in a region .', 'We also hypothesize that entrepreneur create new entity based on related industry operating within the same knowledge pool .', 'To test these hypothesis , we used the machine learning decision tree method .', 'The input variable are the number of company from 86 industry located in 2,531 community in Poland in 2009 .', 'The target value are the number of new company from these industry created in the year 2009-2015 .', 'The principal result show that localization decision are mostly based on demand and supply industry , in which manufacturing industry play crucial role .', "Path dependency appears in less than half of the industry ' model and thus is not the main factor influencing decision regarding the creation of new company .", 'The highest share of path-dependent industry is in manufacturing sector , but the degree of the dependence is lower than in the service sector .', 'The service sector seems to be the least path-dependent , as service usually serve other industry .', 'Competition in industry is a rare factor in new company creation ; however , if it appears , it usually shrinks the industry .', 'Structure and information in spatial segregation .', 'Ethnoracial residential segregation is a complex , multiscalar phenomenon with immense moral and economic cost .', 'Modeling the structure and dynamic of segregation is a pressing problem for sociology and urban planning , but existing method have limitation .', 'In this paper , we develop a suite of method , grounded in information theory , for studying the spatial structure of segregation .', 'We first advance existing profile and decomposition method by posing two related regionalization method , which allow for profile curve with nonconstant spatial scale and decomposition analysis with nonarbitrary areal unit .', 'We then formulate a measure of local spatial scale , which may be used for both detailed , within-city analysis and intercity comparison .', 'These method highlight detailed insight in the structure and dynamic of urban segregation that would be otherwise easy to miss or difficult to quantify .', 'They are computationally efficient , applicable to a broad range of study question , and freely available in open source software .']

['Local and application-specific geodemographics for data-led urban decision making .', 'This work seeks to introduce improvement to the traditional variable selection procedure employed in the development of geodemographic classification .', 'It presents a proposal for shifting from a traditional approach for generating general-purpose one-size-fits-all geodemographic classification to application-specific classification .', 'This proposal addresses the recent scepticism towards the utility of general-purpose application by employing supervised machine learning technique in order to identify contextually relevant input variable from which to develop geodemographic classification with increased discriminatory power .', 'A framework introducing such technique in the variable selection phase of geodemographic classification development is presented via a practical use-case that is focused on generating a geodemographic classification with an increased capacity for discriminating the propensity for Library use in the UK city of Leeds .', 'Two local classification are generated for the city , one a general-purpose classification , and the other , an application-specific classification incorporating supervised Feature Selection method in the selection of input variable .', 'The discriminatory power of each classification is evaluated and compared , with the result successfully demonstrating the capacity for the application-specific approach to generate a more contextually relevant result , and thus underpins increasingly targeted public policy decision making , particularly in the context of urban planning .', 'Classification of Urban Functional Areas from Remote Sensing Images and Time-Series User Behavior Data .', 'Urbanization is accelerating at a rapid rate , which has introduced many challenge , especially in the field of urban planning .', 'Under the backdrop of global urbanization , some city are particularly vulnerable to climate change and natural disaster that are influenced by unplanned urban expansion .', 'Rational planning of urban functional area needs to be strengthened to improve the scientific approach of urban planning and urbanization .', 'In this study , the classification of urban functional area based on dual-modal data ( i.e.', ', remote sensing image and user behavior data ) was implemented using machine learning ( ML ) algorithms .', 'After the set test , the classification accuracy of urban functional area reached 82.45 % .', 'Through analysis , it could be concluded that the use of data of two modality achieved a higher classification accuracy than that achieved by using data of a single modality .', 'The data of the two modality complement each other , and the use of ML algorithms to train such data can yield good result .', 'Machine learning for comparative urban planning at scale : An aviation case study .', 'Aviation is in flux , experiencing 5.4 % yearly growth over the last two decade .', 'However , with COVID-19 aviation was hard hit .', 'This , along with its contribution to global warming , has led to louder call to limit its use .', 'This situation emphasizes how urban planner and technologist could contribute to understanding and responding to this change .', 'This paper explores a novel workflow of performing image-based machine learning ( ML ) on satellite image of over 1.000 world airport that were algonthmically collated using European Space Agency Sentinel2 API .', 'From these , the top 350 United States airport were analyzed with land use parameter extracted around the airport using computer vision , which were mapped against their passenger footfall number .', 'The result demonstrate a scalable approach to identify how easy and beneficial it would be for certain airport to expand or contract and how this would impact the surrounding urban environment in term of pollution and congestion .', 'The generic nature of this workflow makes it possible to potentially extend this method to any large infrastructure and compare and analyze specific feature across a large number of image while being able to understand the same feature through time .', 'This is critical in answering key typology-based urban design challenge at a higher level and without needing to perform on-ground study , which could be expensive and time-consuming .', 'A machine learning-based classification system for urban built-up area using multiple classifier and data source .', 'Information about urban built-up area is important for urban planning and management .', 'However , obtaining accurate information about urban built-up area is a challenge .', 'This study developed a general-purpose built-up area intelligent classification ( BAIC ) system that supports various type of data and classifier .', 'All of the step in the BAIC were implemented using Python module including Numpy , Pandas , matplotlib , and scikit-learn .', 'We used the BAIC to conduct a classification experiment that involved seven type of input data ; namely , Point of Interest ( POI ) , Road Network ( RN ) , nighttime light ( NTL ) , a combination of POI and RN data ( POI_RN ) , a combination of POI and NTL data ( POI_NTL ) , a combination of RN and NTL data ( RN_NTL ) , and a combination of POI , RN , and NTL data ( POI_RN_NTL ) , and five classifier , namely , Logistic Regression ( LR ) , Decision Tree ( DT ) , Random Forests ( RF ) , Gradient Boosted Decision Trees ( GBDT ) , and AdaBoost .', 'The result show the following : ( 1 ) among the 35 combination of the five classifier and seven type of input data , the overall accuracy ( OA ) ranged from 76 to 89 % , F1 value ranged from 0.73 to 0.86 , and the area under the receiver operating characteristic ( ROC ) curve ( AUC ) ranged from 0.83 to 0.95 .', 'The largest F1 value and OA were obtained using the POI_RN_NTL data and AdaBoost , while the largest AUC was obtained using POI_RN_NTL and POI_NTL data against AdaBoost , LR , and RF ; and ( 2 ) the advantage of the BAIC include its support for multi-source input data , its objective accuracy assessment , and its robust classifier .', 'The BAIC can quickly and efficiently realize the automatic classification of urban built-up area at a reasonably low cost and can be readily applied to other urban area in the world where any kind of POI , RN , or NTL data coverage is available .', 'The result of this study are expected to provide timely and effective reference information for urban planning and urban management department , and could also potentially be used to develop large-scale map of urban built-up area in the future .', 'Urban street context classification using convolutional neural network and street imagery .', 'The classification of street on road network has been focused on the vehicular transportational feature of street .', 'Example of street label include arterials , major road , minor road and so forth based on their transportational use .', 'City authority on the other hand have been shifting to more wholistic planning of street .', 'The modern approach towards designing and planning street is more inclusive of the street context , meaning the side use of a street combined with the transportational feature of a street .', 'Several city authority are developing new classification scheme for street context that extends traditional classification method to include the use of land on the side of a street .', 'In those classification scheme , street are labeled for example as commercial throughway , residential neighborhood , park etc .', 'This modern approach to urban planning have been adopted by major city such as the city of San Francisco , the state of Florida and Pennsylvania among many others .', 'Currently , the process of labeling street according to their contexts is manual and hence is tedious and time consuming .', 'It will require manual labor to regularly relabel street as the city develops .', 'In this paper , we propose an approach to deploy advancement in computer vision towards modern urban planning .', 'We propose a framework for automatic classification of street context .', 'Using labeled street imagery we train deep convolutional neural network ( CNN ) to perform the classification of street context .', 'We show that CNN model can perform well achieving accuracy in the 81 % to 87 % range .', 'We test various CNN architecture and report on their performance .', 'Comparison of approach for urban functional zone classification based on multi-source geospatial data : A case study in Yuzhong District , Chongqing , China .', 'Accurate and timely classification and monitoring of urban functional zone prove to be significant in rapidly developing city , to better understand the real and varying urban function of city to support urban planning and management .', 'Many effort have been undertaken to identify urban functional zone using various classification approach and multi-source geospatial datasets .', 'The complexity of this category of classification pose tremendous challenge to these study especially in term of classification accuracy , but on the opposite , the rapid development of machine learning technology provides us with new opportunity .', 'In this study , a set of commonly used urban functional zone classification approach , including Multinomial Logistic Regression , K-Nearest Neighbors , Decision Tree , Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) , and Random Forest , are examined and compared with the newly developed eXtreme Gradient Boosting ( XGBoost ) model , using the case study of Yuzhong District , Chongqing , China .', 'The investigation is based on multi-variate geospatial data , including night-time imagery , geotagged Weibo data , point of interest ( POI ) from Gaode , and Baidu Heat Map .', 'This study is the first endeavor of implementing the XGBoost model in the field of urban functional zone classification .', 'The result suggest that the XGBoost classification model performed the best and was able to achieve an accuracy of 88.05 % , which is significantly higher than the other commonly used approach .', 'In addition , the integration of night-time imagery , geotagged Weibo data , POI from Gaode , and Baidu Heat Map has also demonstrated their value for the classification of urban functional zone in this case study .', 'Exploring different combination of data and method for urban land use analysis : A survey .', 'Modern planning and management of urban space is an essential topic for smart city and depends on up-to-date and reliable information on land use and functional role of the place that integrate urban area .', 'In the last year , driven by increased availability of geo-referenced data from social or embedded sensor and remote sensing ( RS ) image , various method become popular for land use analysis .', 'This paper addresses the various method employed in this context , as well as needed data and respective categorization , best application of each method , and their comparison .', 'We focus on approach based on data from RS image , open map and various category of crowdsourced data .', 'We identify and discuss the way these approach use Data Mining ( DM ) and Machine Learning ( ML ) .', 'From our initial study we concluded that even using the same method and the same kind of data , result depend on spatial configuration of the data , accordingly to the specificity of each region .', 'The work described in this paper is intended to provide relevant contribution to method selection for knowledge discovery for city planning and management , taking into consideration available data and the pro and con of each technique .', 'Deep CNN-based method to evaluate neighborhood-scale urban valuation through street scene perception .', 'Social data from city level provides unprecedented opportunity to identify urban attribute from various angle .', 'Citizen are likely to evaluate the quality of the neighborhood and make important decision by their perception and the feedback from the environment .', "In this paper , we studied the correlation between the neighborhood 's environment with their property value and land value .", 'It is profitable to train the algorithm by parallel deep convolutional neural network on the visual urban scene data associated with quantitative non-visual urban characteristic in the same view .', 'The result of our approach defines a scenarized profile from building-level detail to city-level trait .', 'The main contribution of this work is providing a unique and more accurate perspective to urban valuation estimation , by integrating the scattered source of piece of information and implanting into the available image .', 'This urban evaluation approach will be more human-centered , which can be extended to help urban planner and citizen to explore the significant impact on city decision optimization or spatial economics-related issue like decreasing the cost of property assessment .', 'Using image recognition to automate assessment of cultural ecosystem service from social medium photographs .', 'Quantifying and mapping cultural ecosystem service is complex because of their intangibility .', 'Data from social medium , such as geo-tagged photographs , have been proposed for mapping cultural use or appreciation of ecosystem .', 'However , manual content analysis and classification of large number of photographs is time consuming .', 'This study develops a novel method for automating content analysis of social medium photographs for ecosystem service assessment .', 'The approach applies an online machine learning algorithm – Google Cloud Vision – to analyse over 20,000 photograph from Singapore , and uses hierarchical clustering to group these photograph .', 'The accuracy of the classification was assessed by comparison with manual classification .', 'Over 20 % of photographs were taken of nature , being of animal or plant .', 'The distribution of nature photographs was concentrated around particular natural attraction , and nature photographs were more likely to occur in park and area of high vegetation cover .', 'The approach developed for clustering photographs was accurate and saved approximately 170 h of manual work .', 'The method provides an indicator of cultural ecosystem service that can be applied rapidly over large area .', 'Automated assessment and mapping of cultural ecosystem service could be used to inform urban planning .', 'Can we predict the scenic beauty of location from geo-tagged Flickr image ?', '.', 'In this work , we propose a novel technique to determine the aesthetic score of a location from social metadata of Flickr photo .', 'In particular , we built machine learning classifier to predict the class of a location where each class corresponds to a set of location having equal aesthetic rating .', 'These model are trained on two empirically build datasets containing location in two different city ( Rome and Paris ) where aesthetic rating of location were gathered from TripAdvisor.com .', 'In this work we exploit the idea that in a location with higher aesthetic rating , it is more likely for an user to capture a photo and other user are more likely to interact with that photo .', 'Our model achieved as high as 79.48 % accuracy ( 78.60 % precision and 79.27 % recall ) on Rome dataset and 73.78 % accuracy ( 75.62 % precision and 78.07 % recall ) on Paris dataset .', 'The proposed technique can facilitate urban planning , tour planning and recommending aesthetically pleasing path .', 'Building block level urban land-use information retrieval based on Google Street View image .', 'Land-use map are important reference for urban planning and urban study .', 'Given the heterogeneity of urban land-use type , it is difficult to differentiate different land-use type based on overhead remotely sensed data .', 'Google Street View ( GSV ) image , which capture the façades of building block along street , could be better used to judge the land-use type of different building block based on their façade appearance .', 'Recently developed scene classification algorithms in computer vision community make it possible to categorize different photo semantically based on various image feature descriptor and machine-learning algorithms .', 'Therefore , in this study , we proposed a method to derive detailed land-use information at building block level based on scene classification algorithms and GSV image .', 'Three image feature descriptor ( i.e.', ', scale-invariant feature transform-Fisher , histogram of oriented gradient , GIST ) were used to represent GSV image of different building .', 'Existing land-use map were used to create training datasets to train support vector machine ( SVM ) classifier for categorizing GSV image .', 'The trained SVM classifier were then applied to case study area in New York City , Boston , and Houston , to predict the land-use information at building block level .', 'Accuracy assessment result show that the proposed method is suitable for differentiating residential building and nonresidential building with an accuracy of 85 % or so .', 'Since the GSV image are publicly accessible , this proposed method would provide a new way for building block level land-use mapping in future .', 'Mapping urban form and function at city block level using spatial metric .', 'This paper focuses on the potential of urban metric describing the presence and the configuration of built-up and open space area for mapping distinct type of urban form and function at city block level .', "Next to traditional , patch-based metric used in landscape ecology , alternative metric are proposed , measuring the presence and the spatial arrangement of built-up and open space area along a set of radial transects , along contour parallel to the urban block boundary and along the block 's perimeter , as well as metric describing the internal composition of the built-up area
