.", 'Use of the proposed metric for identifying different type of urban form and function was tested on the Brussels Capital Region .', 'Large-scale vector data was used to define built-up structure and to analyse the morphological property of the built-up area at block level .', 'Decision tree classification was applied in conjunction with bootstrap aggregation to gain insight in the distinctive character of the defined metric , and the robustness of land use and urban form classification based on these metric .', 'Our study point out the shortcoming of traditional landscape ecological metric for mapping urban form and emphasizes the need for alternative approach for analysing urban landscape , more explicitly describing the morphological characteristic of the urban fabric .', 'Urban land use information retrieval based on scene classification of Google Street View image .', 'Land use map are very important reference for the urban planning and management .', 'However , it is difficult and time-consuming to get high-resolution urban land use map .', 'In this study , we propose a new method to derive land use information at building block level based on machine learning and geo-tagged street-level imagery - Google Street View image .', 'Several commonly used generic image feature ( GIST , HoG , and SIFT-Fisher ) are used to represent street-level image of different cityscape in a case study area of New York City .', 'Machine learning is further used to categorize different image based on the calculated image feature of different street-level image .', 'Accuracy assessment result show that the method developed in this study is a promising method for land use mapping at building block level in future .', 'Building type classification using spatial and landscape attribute derived from LiDAR remote sensing data .', 'Building information is one of the key element for a range of urban planning and management practice .', 'In this study , an investigation was performed to classify building delineated from light detection and ranging ( LiDAR ) remote sensing data into three type : single-family house , multiple-family house , and non-residential building .', 'Four kind of spatial attribute describing the shape , location , and surrounding environment of building were calculated and subsequently employed in the classification .', 'Experiment were performed in suburban and downtown site in Denver , CO , USA , considering different building component and neighborhood environment .', 'Building type classification result yielded overall accuracy > 70 % and Kappa > 0.5 for both site , demonstrating the feasibility of obtaining building type information from LiDAR data .', 'The shape attributes , such as width , footprint area , and perimeter , were most useful for identifying building type .', 'Environmental landscape attributes surrounding building , such as the number of road and parking lot pixel , also contributed to obtaining building type information .', 'Combining shape and environmental landscape attribute was necessary to obtain accurate and consistent classification result .', 'Classification of sidewalk in street view image .', 'Mapping sidewalk in urban environment is key in the creation of pedestrian-friendly , sustainable city .', 'Currently , urban planner are hindered by a lack of information available in a format suitable for the large-scale analysis of sidewalk design .', 'To demonstrate the impact that information technology could have in this area , we leverage technique from machine learning and computer vision to gather information about the presence and quality of sidewalk in map image .', 'In particular , we identify sidewalk segment in street view image using a random forest classifier , utilizing a set of local and global feature that include geometric context , presence of lane , pixel color , and location .', 'Our result illustrate that this approach is effective in classifying sidewalk segment in a large set of street view image .', 'This algorithm can be easily extended to other datasets , and can be automated to gather complete , fine-grained detail about sidewalk for arbitrarily large urban environment .', 'Visual gaze analysis of robotic pedestrian moving in urban space .', 'This study is founded on the idea that an analysis of the visual gaze dynamic of pedestrian can increase our understanding of how important architectural feature in urban environment are perceived by pedestrian .', 'The result of such an analysis can lead to improvement in urban design .', 'However , a technical challenge arises when trying to determine the gaze direction of pedestrian recorded on video .', 'High noise level and the subtlety of human gaze dynamic hamper precise calculation .', 'However , as robot can be programmed and analysed more efficiently than human , this study uses them for developing and training a gaze analysis system with the aim to later apply it to human video data using the machine learning technique of manifold alignment .', 'For this study , a laboratory was set up to become a model street scene in which autonomous humanoid robot of approximately 55cm in height simulate the behaviour of human pedestrian .', 'The experiment compare the input from several camera as the robot walks down the model street and changes its behaviour upon encountering visually attractive object .', "Overhead recording and the robot 's internal joint signal are analysed after filtering to provide true data against which the recorded data can be compared for accuracy testing .", 'A central component of the research is the calculation of a torus-like manifold that represents all the different three-dimensional ( 3D ) head direction of a robot head and allows the ordering of extracted 3D gaze vector obtained from video sequence .', 'We briefly describe how the obtained multidimensional trajectory data can be analysed by using a temporal behaviour analysis technique based on support vector machine that was developed separately .']
